name: Happy Hydra!
description:
"Happy Hydra" is a 2D game in which you play as a hydra and have to survive enemies running towards you from the right and left on multiple layers. Spit your dangerous fire to grill (and kill) them. As you kill more and more enemies the range of your attacks will increase, but also get slower. You can split your player character into smaller ones and have more and more hydras, but you also have to control each one on your own at the same time with different keys, so be careful that you don't run out of fingers!

CONTROLS

Split player character:
SPACE then left click on hydra to select, place with left click. Press two keys to assign attack controls for left and right respectively

Spit fire:
Displayed keys below hydra

Survive as long as possible!

The game is over when 5 heads are cut down or none are left over.
